languages.text: Неизвестный катаклизм унес жизни миллиардов подданных Вольного Торговца. Если на планете остались выжившие, вероятнее всего они обосновались неподалеку от источника тепла, что засекли авгуры.

traits.locale_text: Гордость Сантиэля сковал лед — катаклизм унес жизни миллиардов подданных Вольного Торговца. Если на планете остались выжившие, вероятнее всего они обосновались неподалеку от источника тепла, что засекли авгуры.

languages.text: An unknown cataclysm has claimed the lives of billions of the Rogue Trader's subjects. If there are any survivors on the planet, they are probably based near the heat source detected by the augurs.
languages.original_text: Неизвестный катаклизм унес жизни миллиардов подданных Вольного Торговца. Если на планете остались выжившие, вероятнее всего они обосновались неподалеку от источника тепла, что засекли авгуры.

traits.locale_text: Santiel's Pride is bound in ice — the cataclysm has claimed the lives of billions of the Rogue Trader's subjects. If there are any survivors on the planet, they are probably based near the heat source detected by the augers.

Santiel's Pride is bound in ice — the cataclysm has claimed the lives of billions of the Rogue Trader's subjects. If there are any survivors on the planet, they are probably based near the heat source detected by the augers.

Santiel's Pride is bound in ice — the cataclysm has claimed the lives of billions of the Rogue Trader's subjects. If there are any survivors on the planet, they are probably based near the heat source detected by the augers.
An unknown cataclysm has claimed the lives of billions of the Rogue Trader's subjects. If there are any survivors on the planet, they are probably based near the heat source detected by the augurs.
An unknown cataclysm has claimed the lives of billions of the Rogue Trader's subjects. If there are any survivors on the planet, they are probably based near the heat source detected by the augurs.

languages.text: 这个世界爆发了一场未知的灾变，行商浪人属下数十亿臣民尽数丧命。如果这颗行星上还有幸存者的话，他们只有可能在俄歇矩阵扫描到的热源附近。
languages.original_text: An unknown cataclysm has claimed the lives of billions of the Rogue Trader's subjects. If there are any survivors on the planet, they are probably based near the heat source detected by the augurs.

traits.locale_text: 这个世界爆发了一场未知的灾变，行商浪人属下数十亿臣民尽数丧命。如果这颗行星上还有幸存者的话，他们只有可能在俄歇矩阵扫描到的热源附近。

languages.text: 未知の大変動により、何十億もの自由開拓者の臣民の命が奪われた。惑星に生存者がいるなら、おそらくスキャナーによって検出された熱源の近くに拠点を置いているだろう。
languages.original_text: An unknown cataclysm has claimed the lives of billions of the Rogue Trader's subjects. If there are any survivors on the planet, they are probably based near the heat source detected by the augurs.

traits.locale_text: 未知の大変動により、何十億もの自由開拓者の臣民の命が奪われた。惑星に生存者がいるなら、おそらくスキャナーによって検出された熱源の近くに拠点を置いているだろう。

languages.text: Un cataclismo desconocido ha arrebatado la vida a billones de súbditos de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. Si hay supervivientes en el planeta, tienen que estar cerca de la fuente de calor que han detectado los augures.
languages.original_text: An unknown cataclysm has claimed the lives of billions of the Rogue Trader's subjects. If there are any survivors on the planet, they are probably based near the heat source detected by the augurs.

traits.locale_text: Un cataclismo desconocido ha arrebatado la vida a millardos de súbditos de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. Si hay supervivientes en el planeta, tienen que estar cerca de la fuente de calor que han detectado los augures.

languages.text: Eine unbekannte Katastrophe hat Milliarden von Untertanen {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} das Leben gekostet. Falls es auf dem Planeten Überlebende gibt, halten sie sich vermutlich in der Nähe der von den Auguren entdeckten Wärmequelle auf.
languages.original_text: An unknown cataclysm has claimed the lives of billions of the Rogue Trader's subjects. If there are any survivors on the planet, they are probably based near the heat source detected by the augurs.

traits.locale_text: Eine unbekannte Katastrophe hat Milliarden von Untertanen {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} das Leben gekostet. Falls es auf dem Planeten Überlebende gibt, halten sie sich vermutlich in der Nähe der von den Auguren entdeckten Wärmequelle auf.

languages.text: Un cataclysme inconnu a coûté la vie à des milliards de sujets {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}. S'il reste des survivants sur la planète, ils se trouvent probablement près de la source de chaleur détectée par les augures.
languages.original_text: An unknown cataclysm has claimed the lives of billions of the Rogue Trader's subjects. If there are any survivors on the planet, they are probably based near the heat source detected by the augurs.

traits.locale_text: Un cataclysme inconnu a coûté la vie à des milliards de sujets {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}. S'il reste des survivants sur la planète, ils se trouvent probablement près de la source de chaleur détectée par les augures.

languages.text: Bilinmeyen bir felaket, Hür Tacir'in milyarlarca tebaasının canını almış. Gezegende hayatta kalan birileri varsa muhtemelen alametlerin tespit ettiği ısı kaynağının yakınındadırlar.
languages.original_text: An unknown cataclysm has claimed the lives of billions of the Rogue Trader's subjects. If there are any survivors on the planet, they are probably based near the heat source detected by the augurs.

traits.locale_text: Bilinmeyen bir felaket, Hür Tacir'in milyarlarca tebaasının yaşamına mâl olmuş. Eğer gezegende birileri hayatta kaldıysa muhtemelen alametlerin tespit ettiği ısı kaynağının yakınlarındadırlar.
